name: The Lone Cat
description:
This game was made for the 'Yogscast Game Jam' in the span of 48 hours (most likely less). Everything in this game is made from the bottom, except for one sprite.

You play as a cat whose owner has left you. Your goal is to somehow get the owner to come back to you.

Originally the protagonist was meant to be humanoid. They were meant to travel through 5 unique areas and explore the region. I had planned a story and everything, but while creating this game I also worked on a semester project. Since we were behind we had to work in the weekend, I had less time to finalize this game, which I now consider a prototype, or proof of concept.

This approximately amounts to 1/5 of what I originally wanted to make. But maybe someday I will finish what I originally set out to do.

(Rate the Game Here) https://itch.io/jam/yogscast-game-jam/rate/535605

INSTRUCTIONS / GOAL:

You must gather resources and deliver them to the fireplace.

BUGS:

It may be impossible to finish the game if you pick up both resources and deliver them. The only workaround is to only collect one resource at a time and deliver it. Since it's a Game Jam I cannot upload my fixed version. Sorry about the inconvenience!
